short_summary: Lease and maintenance of a King Air B300 series aircraft
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the lease and maintenance of a King Air B300 series aircraft for use at 8 Wing Trenton.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) No. W6399-23-LN39/A 

### Title
Lease of a Beechcraft B300 Series Aircraft for Use at 8 Wing Trenton

### Reference No.
cb-438-47090656

### Publication Date
June 30, 2023

### Tender Closing Date
August 9, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EDT

### Solicitation Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the lease and maintenance of a King Air B300 series aircraft for use at 8 Wing Trenton. The period of the Contract is one (1) year from the date of Contract award, with an option to extend the period by two (2) additional one (1) year periods.

### Bid Submission
Bids must be submitted via email before the tender closing date to Mariela Ileto at mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Notice Requirements
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

### Attachments
* [RFP Document - English] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6821/w6399-23ln39_a_rfp-en.pdf>
* [RFP Document - French] <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6821/w6399-23ln39_a_rfp-fr.pdf>

### Noticeboard URL
None

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category:** Supply and Services
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** World
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
mariela.ileto@forces.gc.ca
(613) 945-2746

### UNSPSC Codes
* 78111505 - Passenger aircraft rental or leasing service

I removed all irrelevant sections from the input provided. Let your professional judgement guide you through what to include and what not to include. Do not copy or include any irrelevant part. Work within the 400 words limit.  The entries have been formatted into markdown format for better readability. 

Feel free to ask if you
